pageTitle: The service is temporarily unavailable - Send an SR1 - GOV.UK
h1: This service is temporarily unavailable - error 503
p1: If the problem continues, you can complete PDF versions of the SR1 and the fee claim forms online. They do not need to be signed, but youâ€™ll need to return them to us from a secure email address. Any email that does not come from a secure email address will be automatically deleted.

section2.p1: Send the request for a PDF version of the SR1 form, and fee claim form if needed, from your secure email address to form.e-sr1@dwp.gov.uk. Please include your:

p2: Do not encrypt any part of the email.
